full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**
=====================================================

**Project Title:** Spare Parts Requirement for Armored Vehicles

**Reference Number:** WS3686863281-Doc3726578349

**Closing Date:** December 13, 2022, 14:00 EST

**Description:**
Global Affairs Canada (GAC) is seeking a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the procurement of spare parts for their armored vehicle fleet. The procurement will be conducted in two phases.

**Phase 1:** GAC requires companies with a strong background in Armored Vehicles to provide the requested parts to GAC headquarters in Ottawa within a reasonable time period, as dictated by operational requirements.

**Phase 2:** The pre-qualified Offerors from Phase 1 will be invited to submit a RFSO for the procurement of spare parts.

**Standing Offer Agreement:**
The Standing Offer Agreement will be valid from the date of issuance for a three (3) year period, with the option to extend this period by two (2) additional one (1) year periods under the same terms and conditions.

**Requirements:**

* The Offeror must have a strong background in Armored Vehicles.
* The Offeror must provide the requested parts to GAC headquarters in Ottawa within a reasonable time period.
* The Offeror must be able to provide the parts to the specified requirements.
* The Offeror must be able to meet the operational requirements of GAC.

**Selction Criteria:**
The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others.

**Procurement Method:**
The procurement method will be competitive, with selective tendering.

**By clicking on the link below, you can access the full bid document and associated files.**
